page.title: 07RELIGION AROUND BERROW
page.content: There are four places of worship: two Protestant{churches}(All Saints, Hollybush and St.Faith's, Berrow), a Methodist Church in Birt Street, and Coombe Green Mission Hall (used for children's Sunday School, occasional services, meetings, and charity fund raising).{Religious denominations include Church of England, Church of Ireland, Roman Catholic, Presbyterian, Methodist, Spiritualist: Jehovah's Witnesses are active from time to time. One resident{vicar}runs three churches, only one of which,Hollybush, is in the area. Berrow Church is run with three other churches by another vicar.Congregations are elderly. The young are enticed away by various sporting events, taking place on Sun- days.In spite of small congregations, there is good support for the upkeep of churches by fetes etc.
